item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my newly redesigned and relaunched website. I rebuilt the site to explore some new ideas I picked up after a year of working as a professional web developer. More notably I threw out a number of superfluous pieces in favor of some simpler layouts that play nicer with accessibility and responsive concerns.
